name: Jikandia: The Timeless Land
description:
Jikandia: The Timeless Land takes you the player (male or female) along with your friends from school and transports them to the land of Jikandia where time doesn't exist.
Help guide your friends through the perils of Jikandia and save the people whose time was lost along with the Jikandia native, Temtem. Traverse dungeons with the time limit of your choosing and try to locate the King of Time, so that time may once again be restored to Jikandia. Battle friends via Ad Hoc in the Jikandia Coliseum to see who is the best Jikandia player around.
Do you have it in you to save Jikandia and to defeat the King of Time!?

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).
